verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. Plead <WH7378> <WH8798> my cause, O YY <WH3068>, with them that strive <WH3401> with me: fight <WH3898> <WH8798> against them that fight <WH3898> <WH8802> against me.
Take hold <WH2388> <WH8685> of shield <WH4043> and buckler <WH6793>, and stand up <WH6965> <WH8798> for mine help <WH5833>.

Draw out <WH7324> <WH8685> also the spear <WH2595>, and stop <WH5462> <WH8798> the way against <WH7125> <WH8800> them that persecute <WH7291> <WH8802> me: say <WH559> <WH8798> unto my soul <WH5315>, I am thy salvation <WH3444>.

Let them be confounded <WH954> <WH8799> and put to shame <WH3637> <WH8735> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> after my soul <WH5315>: let them be turned <WH5472> <WH8735> back <WH268> and brought to confusion <WH2659> <WH8799> that devise <WH2803> <WH8802> my hurt <WH7451>.
Let them be as chaff <WH4671> before <WH6440> the wind <WH7307>: and let the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> chase <WH1760> <WH8802> them.
Let their way <WH1870> be dark <WH2822> and slippery <WH2519>: and let the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> persecute <WH7291> <WH8802> them.
For without cause <WH2600> have they hid <WH2934> <WH8804> for me their net <WH7568> in a pit <WH7845>, which without cause <WH2600> they have digged <WH2658> <WH8804> for my soul <WH5315>.

Let destruction <WH7722> come <WH935> <WH8799> upon him at unawares <WH3045> <WH8799> <WH3808>; and let his net <WH7568> that he hath hid <WH2934> <WH8804> catch <WH3920> <WH8799> himself: into that very destruction <WH7722> let him fall <WH5307> <WH8799>.
And my soul <WH5315> shall be joyful <WH1523> <WH8799> in the YY <WH3068>: it shall rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> in his salvation <WH3444>.

All my bones <WH6106> shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, YY <WH3068>, who is like unto thee, which deliverest <WH5337> <WH8688> the poor <WH6041> from him that is too strong <WH2389> for him, yea, the poor <WH6041> and the needy <WH34> from him that spoileth <WH1497> <WH8802> him?
False <WH2555> witnesses <WH5707> did rise up <WH6965> <WH8799>; they laid to my charge <WH7592> <WH8799> things that I knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not.
They rewarded <WH7999> <WH8762> me evil <WH7451> for good <WH2896> to the spoiling <WH7908> of my soul <WH5315>.

But as for me, when they were sick <WH2470> <WH8800>, my clothing <WH3830> was sackcloth <WH8242>: I humbled <WH6031> <WH8765> my soul <WH5315> with fasting <WH6685>; and my prayer <WH8605> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> into mine own bosom <WH2436>.

I behaved <WH1980> <WH8694> myself as though he had been my friend <WH7453> or brother <WH251>: I bowed down <WH7817> <WH8804> heavily <WH6937> <WH8802>, as one that mourneth <WH57> for his mother <WH517>.

But in mine adversity <WH6761> they rejoiced <WH8055> <WH8804>, and gathered themselves together <WH622> <WH8738>: yea, the abjects <WH5222> gathered themselves together <WH622> <WH8738> against me, and I knew <WH3045> <WH8804> it not; they did tear <WH7167> <WH8804> me, and ceased <WH1826> <WH8804> not:
With hypocritical <WH2611> mockers <WH3934> in feasts <WH4580>, they gnashed <WH2786> <WH8800> upon me with their teeth <WH8127>.
YY <WH136>, how long wilt thou look on <WH7200> <WH8799>? rescue <WH7725> <WH8685> my soul <WH5315> from their destructions <WH7722>, my darling <WH3173> from the lions <WH3715>.
I will give thee thanks <WH3034> <WH8686> in the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>: I will praise <WH1984> <WH8762> thee among much <WH6099> people <WH5971>.

Let not them that are mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> wrongfully <WH8267> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> over me: neither let them wink <WH7169> <WH8799> with the eye <WH5869> that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me without a cause <WH2600>.
For they speak <WH1696> <WH8762> not peace <WH7965>: but they devise <WH2803> <WH8799> deceitful <WH4820> matters <WH1697> against them that are quiet <WH7282> in the land <WH776>.
Yea, they opened their mouth <WH6310> wide <WH7337> <WH8686> against me, and said <WH559> <WH8804>, Aha <WH1889>, aha <WH1889>, our eye <WH5869> hath seen <WH7200> <WH8804> it.
This thou hast seen <WH7200> <WH8804>, O YY <WH3068>: keep not silence <WH2790> <WH8799>: O YY <WH136>, be not far <WH7368> <WH8799> from me.
Stir up <WH5782> <WH8685> thyself, and awake <WH6974> <WH8685> to my judgment <WH4941>, even unto my cause <WH7379>, my 'Elohim <WH430> and my YY <WH136>.
Judge <WH8199> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, according to thy righteousness <WH6664>; and let them not rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> over me.
Let them not say <WH559> <WH8799> in their hearts <WH3820>, Ah <WH1889>, so would we have it <WH5315>: let them not say <WH559> <WH8799>, We have swallowed him up <WH1104> <WH8765>.

Let them be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> and brought to confusion <WH2659> <WH8799> together <WH3162> that rejoice <WH8056> at mine hurt <WH7451>: let them be clothed <WH3847> <WH8799> with shame <WH1322> and dishonour <WH3639> that magnify <WH1431> <WH8688> themselves against me.

Let them shout for joy <WH7442> <WH8799>, and be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>, that favour <WH2655> my righteous cause <WH6664>: yea, let them say <WH559> <WH8799> continually <WH8548>, Let the YY <WH3068> be magnified <WH1431> <WH8799>, which hath pleasure <WH2655> in the prosperity <WH7965> of his servant <WH5650>.
And my tongue <WH3956> shall speak <WH1897> <WH8799> of thy righteousness <WH6664> and of thy praise <WH8416> all the day <WH3117> long.
